name: Love In the Valley
description:
A mysterious new farmer is in town. They're silent, rich, and super hot. The spring flower dance is only a week away! Can you win their affections and score a date with them to the dance?

Stardew Valley meets Monster Prom in this visual novel! You can play as Sebastian or Abigail and visit Cindersap Forest and Town Square. This is a fan project with a group of volunteers who liked the idea on TikTok. If you want to help us expand it in the future (more characters, more locations, more scenes), feel free to reach out! 

Each character has three possible endings. Can you unlock them all?

Also worth mentioning, this is fan art, so we don't want to profit off it! It's free to play here, we ask that you don't download or distribute it elsewhere. <3 We hope you love it! 

Credits:

This project was made possible with the help of a lot of awesome volunteers! 

Led by IfThenCreate (Reagan, she/her). Reagan organized the team, wrote the code, did UI design, sound design, wrote some scenes and made some assets. She made a Tiktok about NightlingBug's tweet and things took off from there! You can see more of her links and projects here on itch or through IfThenCreate's linktree. 

Nat (she/her) created multiple character art assets and the baseline sketches for the rest for this project. You can see more of her work on tumblr (Divine-Draws) and on TikTok (divine_draws).

Larrissa D. (she/her) created title screen icon, map, and a bunch of other refurbished assets! You can see more of her work on instagram; Venomous.Vipers and DeviantArt; @NillValintine.

Mattias Mihelich (they/them) Composed music for this project. More of their work can be seen on YouTube at Mattias Mihelich

Also thanks to: 

  • Boopie (she/they) - artist and writer
  • HiddenDreamer67 (Mandy, she/her) - writer
  • Tootsie-Pimples (Mayra, she/her) - artist 
  • BarcingMatter (Barclay, he/they) - farmer character design
